_header: So as I lay this other night
_description: John Lydgate [?], ‘Timor mortis conturbat me’ — sixteen 8-line stanzas with this refrain

BLHar2255.First Lines:
So as I lay this othir nyghtIn my bed tournyng vp so
                    doun…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Thanne ofte thynke on Cristes passiounWhan timor mortis
                    conturbat me
BLHar2255.Note:
The Latin refrain and proper names are underscored in
                    rubric.
